question_text: Which of the following are true about Bluetooth's operating range and use cases? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Bluetooth is typically used for personal device communication
Bluetooth operates effectively over hundreds of meters
Bluetooth is ideal for mobile headset pairing
Bluetooth generally covers entire office floors
Bluetooth is designed for low-power, short-range use
correct_answer: Bluetooth is typically used for personal device communication
Bluetooth is ideal for mobile headset pairing
Bluetooth is designed for low-power, short-range use
explanation: Bluetooth was built for short-range, low-power personal networking, not for building-wide or long-distance communication.
